text: Alexander M. Gorlov (March 23, 1931 â€“ June 10, 2016) was a Russian-born American mechanical engineer. He was Professor Emeritus and Director of Hydro- Pneumatic Power Laboratory at Northeastern University in Boston, Massachusetts. He was known for creating the Gorlov Helical Turbine. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Engineers from Massachusetts Category:Educators from Boston Category:Scientists from Moscow Category:Scientists from Boston Category:Russian engineers Category:Mechanical engineers
